TopicTitle: intermittent crash on revert to launch or KSC and/or or scene change

Articles.Content:
I've been crashing every now and again lately when reverting a flight or switching scenes in KSC ( like from main view to VAB like in the sample provided ). I do realize there's a lot of mods enabled, but I can't seem to pin one down as the culprit, game is career mode so switching between ships a lot while building satellite network for example.

This is running on Win7 Pro 64-bit SP1, GeForce 780ti, i7 2700K, 16Gb RAM and steam-installed 32-bit KSP 1.0.2

Mods installed:

USI Tools - 0.4.1

CapCom Mission Control On The Go - 1.0.1.1

Community Resource Pack - 0.4.2

Contract Configurator - 1.2.5

Contract Pack: Anomaly Surveyor - 1.2.2

CC-CP-SCANSat - 0.5.2

Contract Pack: Field Research - 1.0.2

Contract Pack: Initial Contracts - 1.0.2

Contract Pack: Kerbal Space Station - 2.1.1

Contract Pack: RemoteTech - 1.1.4

Contract Pack: Tourism Plus - 1.1.4

Contracts Window Plus - 1.0.5.1

DMagic Orbital Science - 1.0.4

Engine Lighting - 1.3

RasterPropMonitor - 0.20

KAS - 0.5.2

Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.0.16.6

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.1.3

HyperEdit - 1.4.1

KerboKatzUtilities - 1.2.9

ForScienceContinued! - 1.0.4

KIS - 1.1.5

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

Infernal Robots - 0.21.2

Docking Port Alignment Indicator - 6.2

RemoteTech - 1.6.5

SCANsat - 1.1.2.1

SmartStage - 2.6.1

ThrottleControlledAvionics - 2.2.1

USI-LS - 0.1.2

Sounding Rockets - 0.2

Universal Storage - 1.1.0.4

[x] Science! - 4.4

Output log: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/nq69zuc9j40q3b4/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nq69zuc9j40q3b4/output_log.txt?dl=0)

not available): RtlInitializeExceptionChain + 0x63(0x775192B5) (ntdll): (filename not available): RtlInitializeExceptionChain + 0x36========== END OF STACKTRACE ===========**** Crash! ****
There is a memory leak in KSP which causes it to crash the longer you play.

There is no memory leak on scene change, the only known memory leak is with the PPFX edge highlighter used for the thermal effects, a previous leak with action group sliders has already been fixed. 

Faile, your log says the last thing to happen before the crash involved infernal robotics.

> 
> IR: [servoController] destroy
> (Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)
> 
> UnloadTime: 14.944353 ms
> 
> Crash!!!

I suggest you ensure IR is up to date, if it is I'd try removing it to see if the crashing stops, if it does it would be worth reporting the issue on the infernal robotics thread.
I removed IR and disabled PPFX, no change. Removed a few more mods now, I suspect it's an unrelated memory issue.
